mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods (goodsno, adminno, itemno, seqno, gname, content, word, rdate, file1, file1savedm thumb1, size1, price, dc, saleprice, salecnt, point) VALUES(goods_seq.nextval, #{adminno}, #{itemno}, #{seqno}, #{gname}, #{content}, #{word}, sysdate, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, #{price}, #{dc}, #{saleprice}, #{salecnt}, #{point})
mapper.select: SELECT goodsno, adminno, itemno, seqno, gname, content, word, rdate, file1, file1savedm thumb1, size1, price, dc, saleprice, salecnt, point FROM goods ORDER BY goods ASC
SELECT goodsno, adminno, itemno, seqno, gname, content, word, rdate, file1, file1savedm thumb1, size1, price, dc, saleprice, salecnt, point FROM goods WHERE itemno = #{itemno} ORDER BY goodsno DESC
SELECT goodsno, adminno, itemno, seqno, gname, content, word, rdate, file1, file1savedm thumb1, size1, price, dc, saleprice, salecnt, point FROM goods WHERE goodsno = #{goodsno}

SELECT goodsno, adminno, itemno, seqno, gname, content, word, rdate, file1, file1savedm thumb1, size1, price, dc, saleprice, salecnt, point FROM goods
WHERE itemno=#{itemno}
WHERE itemno=#{itemno} AND (UPPER(title) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(content) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(word) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
ORDER BY goodsno DESC
